K12D0454_H0421:193b-1: a'arya n'i lam ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ru dra bi tri bi na tantra n'a ma /
K12D0454_H0421:193b-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
K12D0454_H0421:193b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0454_H0421:193b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0454_H0421:193b-6: bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam par 'joms pa bdud kyi
K12D0454_H0421:193b-7: sde dang lhan cig tu 'og man gzhan 'phrul dbang
K12D0454_H0421:193b-8: byed kyi pho brang na thabs cig tu bzhugs so
K12D0454_H0421:193b-9: // gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
K12D0454_H0421:193b-10: rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung
K12D0454_H0421:193b-11: gi bye ma snyed kyi rjes su gnang ba 'di
K12D0454_H0421:193b-12: lag na rdo rjes zungs cig ces bka' stsal to
K12D0454_H0421:193b-13: // // de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-0: gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag @194a *//
K12D0454_H0421:194a-1: bye ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-2: mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-3: mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-6: padma dang chu lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-7: nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-8: sprul rin po che 'bar ba'i cod pan thogs pa;
K12D0454_H0421:194a-9: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas snyan
K12D0454_H0421:194a-10: cha byas pa / rkang pas sprul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing za ba /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-11: klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-12: sprul nag po se ral khar thogs pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-14: smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-15: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-18: gsus po che sprul za ba /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-19: rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-20: dbang po dang nyi ma'i steng na bzhugs pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-21: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-22: aa la la zhes bsgrags pas skrag par byed pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-23: klu thams cad brlag par byed pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-24: gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-25: gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa /
K12D0454_H0421:194a-26: klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-0: zhes byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod nas gsung du gsol zhes @194b smras so //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-1: de nas nam mkha' de nyid la gzhal yas khang dang /
K12D0454_H0421:194b-2: 'khor lo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i drag po chen pos 'khor bsdus nas /
K12D0454_H0421:194b-3: phyag na rdo rje drag po che //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-4: rdo rje khro bo drag chen 'joms //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-5: rdo rje gzi brjid sngags kyi gtso //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-6: rdo rje mi thub 'jigs byed che //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-7: rdo rje 'phrin las kun don mdzad //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-9: 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid che; ;mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-10: mdangs can sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-11: skyed byed las kun sgrub pa la //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-12: 'gugs shing sdud dang sdom zhi mdzad //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-13: mtha' brtul las rnams sgrub pa la //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-14: thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-16: bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-17: 'khor lo'i bdag po khyod la bstod //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-18: sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-19: thabs dang shes rab sreg gso mdzad //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-20: bde chen rab tu gsol mdzad nas //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-22: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu tma nn'a tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um/
K12D0454_H0421:194b-23: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12D0454_H0421:194b-24: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la legs
K12D0454_H0421:194b-25: so zhes bya ba byin nas 'khor rnams spros te
K12D0454_H0421:194b-26: / de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das /
K12D0454_H0421:194b-28: de'i phyir 'di'i gsang sngags las thams cad sgrub pa //
K12D0454_H0421:195a-2: drag po gsum 'dul ba 'di gsung du gsol zhes
K12D0454_H0421:195a-3: brjod nas bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'khor rnams
K12D0454_H0421:195a-5: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung gi
K12D0454_H0421:195a-6: bye ma snyed kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i
K12D0454_H0421:195a-7: rig sngags 'di gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i don
K12D0454_H0421:195a-10: bho bho pam n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-11: ai dam n'i lampa ra dha ra sha r'i ram/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-12: badzra p'a ni hri da yam/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-13: ya sa m'a ti kra ma tha /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-14: m'a ku la aut s'a da nam bha bi shya ti /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-16: buddha buddha bi buddha bi buddha /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-18: ha ra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-19: pra ha ra pra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-20: tstshinda tstshinda n'a ga hri da y'a ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-21: bhim da bham da n'a ga marma ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-22: bi sh'intu n'a ga sha r'i ram/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-23: bi spho ta ya n'a ga na ya n'a ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-26: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-27: n'a go ta s'a da n'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-28: n'i l'a ba sa n'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-29: aa pri ta ha ta ba la ba ra kra m'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-31: kri t'anta ru p'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-34: kushm'a na do ta s'a da na ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-35: pre ta pi sha tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-36: yaksha aa pasma ra bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-39: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12D0454_H0421:195a-40: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya; sarbba bighn'an bi na sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-41: sarba sha dzum [?] sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12D0454_H0421:195a-42: n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-0: gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa la @195b chu
K12D0454_H0421:195b-1: la sngags btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro
K12D0454_H0421:195b-4: bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-5: [?] dvags dang brjed byed rnams la ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-7: rims nad med par bya ba dang /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-12: zhag gcig bsnyungs bar 'dug ste spos kyis bdugs na /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-13: rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston no //
K12D0454_H0421:195b-14: mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me
K12D0454_H0421:195b-15: tog sngon po la sogs pas mchod la sngags stong
K12D0454_H0421:195b-16: bzlas nas gsol ba btab na /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-17: gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do //
K12D0454_H0421:195b-18: rgyas btab pa 'grol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o //
K12D0454_H0421:195b-19: sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na nyungs kar gyis bya'o //
K12D0454_H0421:195b-20: 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba la ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-21: rtsi mar snying pa dang thal ba dang nyungs kar gyis bya'o //
K12D0454_H0421:195b-22: nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad la ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-23: skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas
K12D0454_H0421:195b-24: te mgul du btags na; srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur
K12D0454_H0421:195b-25: ro // byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa thams cad la ni /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-26: tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa mgul la btags na /
K12D0454_H0421:195b-28: chom rkun zlog par 'dod na sas bya'o //
K12D0454_H0421:195b-30: rtsva ku shas bya ba par bya'o //
K12D0454_H0421:196a-6: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0454_H0421:196a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0454_H0421:196a-8: bdud dpung dang bcas pa rjes su yi rang ste bstan pa la 'khod do //
K12D0454_H0421:196a-9: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
K12D0454_H0421:196a-10: drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs
K12D0454_H0421:196a-11: so //// bal po'i pandi ta de ba pu ndya ma ti dang /
